p: Thermogravimetric analysis was carried out in synthetic air as a gas carrier (20 cm 3 min –1) and with a heating rate of 10 K min –1 in a Pt crucible. In a typical analysis, 10 mg of samples was weighed with a Thermo Microbalance TG 209 F1 Libra (Netzsch Selb, Germany) while increasing the temperature.
